title: Kourtney Kardashian rocks asymmetrical ensemble as she heads out to Nobu
text:
She said in the latest Keeping Up With The Kardashians promo that she's happy being alone and hanging out with friends and 'didn't need anybody.'

And Kourtney Kardashian proved that was the case on Friday evening when she was spotted solo during a dinner outing in West Hollywood.

The 40-year-old headed out to popular restaurant, Nobu, for a meal in a stellar ensemble.

She's still got it! Kourtney Kardashian flaunted her stellar style on Friday evening when she stepped out for a dinner date at Nobu in West Hollywood

Kourtney rocked a black asymmetrical top that featured a one-sleeve design and scooped around her neck.

She teamed the form-fitting top with a pair of cobalt blue straight legged trousers that were perfectly hemmed to fit her 5ft frame.

The mom-of-three completed her ensemble with black pointed toe stiletto boots and carried a small Prada handbag in her hand.

Fashionista: Kourtney rocked a black asymmetrical top that featured a one-sleeve design and scooped around her neck

Gorgeous: Kourtney styled her dark tresses out into loose natural waves for the dinner event

Kourtney styled her dark tresses out into loose natural waves for the dinner event.

Her glam showcased a dewy complexion with a smokey eye and plump nude pout to complete the look.

The eldest Kardashian sister's appearance comes after she told pal Larsa Pippen in the latest KUWTK promo that she was 'over texting random guys' and was 'content' not dating anyone.

'I just feel like I'm in a different place where I feel just don't feel like I need that,' the Poosh founder said.

'I'm content hanging out with my friends. I just feel like I'm on a different vibe. I feel so content with just myself. I don't feel like I need anybody.'

Happy being alone! The eldest Kardashian sister's appearance comes after she told pal Larsa Pippen in the latest KUWTK promo that she was 'over texting random guys' and was 'content' not dating anyone

New Kourtney: 'I just feel like I'm in a different place where I feel just don't feel like I need that,' the Poosh founder said. 'I'm content hanging out with my friends. I just feel like I'm on a different vibe. I feel so content with just myself. I don't feel like I need anybody'

The scene was filmed following her split from boyfriend Younes Bendjima, 26, and rebound fling, fling Luka Sabbat, 21.

Larsa was also going through her own personal struggles having recently filed for divorce from NBA alum Scottie Pippen.

While the scenes were filmed back in May during a friends and family girl's trip to Turks and Caicos, it's believed Kourtney has since slightly rekindled things with Younes.

'They spend some time together. It's more of a friend situation,' a source told People recently.

'You could call it casually dating. It's definitely not a relationship. They have known each other for a long time and Kourtney has fun with him. She isn't happy about being photographed with him though. She has been trying to just keep it private.'
description: Kourtney Kardashian flaunted her stellar style on Friday evening when she stepped out for a dinner date at Nobu in West Hollywood.
